downloadTitle: Performance Analyzer (Preview) for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Unified Service Desk
downloadDescription: Download the Performance Analyzer (Preview) for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Unified Service Desk
detailsSection:
Unified Service Desk Performance Analyzer is a powerful performance monitoring tool that analyzes the operations of your Unified Service Desk client from the performance data logs and generates in-depth report to identify the problematic areas. The report provides a detailed analysis like the duration of every operation so that you focus on these areas to troubleshoot the issues effectively. For more information, see Unified Service desk Performance Analyzer (Preview).

This download contains the setup for the following:
  • Performance Analyzer (Preview) for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Unified Service Desk
The right to use Unified Service Desk is limited to the user or device to whom the qualifying Professional Use Client Access License (CAL) is assigned. You may not access or use Unified Service Desk after your Software Assurance or Enhancement Plan coverage expires. For Product Use Rights, click here.
systemRequirementsSection:
Unified Service Desk requires an instance of Microsoft Dynamics 365 (online) or Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises).

For detailed information about the minimum system requirements for installing the Unified Service Desk client application and deploying the sample packages, see Unified Service Desk system requirements.
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click Download.
  2. Choose the file that you want to download, and click Next.
  3. You'll be prompted to save the file. Click Save to save the file to your computer.
    • Download the PerformanceAnalyzer_amd64 or PerformanceAnalyzer_i386 zip package
    • Extract the zip folder
    • Run the UnifiedServiceDeskPerformanceAnalyzer executable file.

    For more information, see Unified Service Desk Performance Analyzer.
